channel.title: Change ddag to shield slot in pimp?
channel.description: yeah... can anyone help me change the ddagger to shield slot in pimp, and if possible make it appear in left hand...

item.title: Change ddag to shield slot in pimp?
item.dc:creator: @Blake11roys Blake11roys
item.description:
@Blake11roys wrote:

umm idk about making it in left hand but this will make it a sheild

go to item.java and u should see this

public static int shields[] = {####,####,

(the #### is the id’s of sheilds)

ok add 1215 to it so it’ll look like htis

public static int shields[] = {1215,####,####,

Read full topic
item.source: Change ddag to shield slot in pimp?
